ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Fighting on after linkdeath
ygData.msgSnippet: Lies!  Lies!  It can t be!! C mon...we re so...so...UBER...a bardish Dragon *must* be amazingly powerful, all knowing, wise, rich, and just so attractive! Like
ygData.messageBody:
Lies! Lies! It can't be!!

C'mon...we're so...so...UBER...a bardish Dragon *must* be amazingly
powerful, all knowing, wise, rich, and just so attractive!

Like me...er, us! Right!?

Atonal

-----Original Message-----
From: Greg Gillan [mailto:ggillan@...]
Sent: Monday, December 11, 2000 9:38 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Fighting on after linkdeath


Yeah, the bard dragon is the wussiest one :(


Elwyn <Da`Kor>
60 Bard, Erollisi Marr

-----Original Message-----
From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
[mailto:garramone@...]
Sent: Sunday, December 10, 2000 12:57 PM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Fighting on after linkdeath


one of the dragons in VP is a bard. we have only fought her on saturday
afternoons while i am at work, so i don't know how she fights or how we know
it's a bard. i should probably ask hehe.

Shada, 58 Bard
Afterlife
